sentence.Network_en: Her nostrils were pinkish, as though she had a cold.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的鼻孔略带粉红，好像患了感冒似的。

sentence.Network_en: He stuck out his tongue and flared his nostrils.
sentence.Network_cn: 他伸出舌头，鼻翼扇动着。

sentence.Network_en: I turned to Jacky, my nostrils flaring in disgust.
sentence.Network_cn: 我转过身厌恶地看着杰基，鼻翼呼呼地翕动着。
